title: I don't see Zed nerfs in the Patch Notes! Funny joke, Riot.
body:
Hilarious, but can you please fix them? Seeing as you know, you nerfed a small amount of AP assassins and then you removed DFG! And the only 'nerf' Zed got was a very minor attack speed nerf, which is irrelevant towards him seeing as his core items both give mass amounts of AS. But then you proceed to nerf more AP assassins and yet again leave the guy who is king of midlane at the moment alone. This is Lee Sin all over again! Zed is a low-risk, high-reward assassin, something Kassadin got gutted for. Aside from this he has 'free' wave clear, insane early game damage that spikes at 6, in order to counter his ultimate you need Zhonya's or you will either blow flash or die. Zed has the best waveclear in the game, as well as it being 'free'.

But the icing on the cake is his insane mobility, his shadows last for way to long allowing for easy juking, escaping, chasing whatever he wants to do ,Zed can do it. Why is he still in his current state while you nerf all others?
